  • Constructor Details

    • Boid

      public Boid(Point2D.Float[] positions, Point2D.Float[] velocities, float maxSpeed, float maxForce, float fieldOfView, long step, int diameter, float cohesionCoeff, float alignmentCoeff, float seperationCoeff)
      Constructs a Boid with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      positions - Initial positions of the boids.
      velocities - Initial velocities of the boids.
      maxSpeed - Maximum speed of the boids.
      maxForce - Maximum force that can be applied to the boids.
      fieldOfView - Field of view angle for the boids.
      step - Simulation step size.
      diameter - Diameter of each boid for visualization.
      cohesionCoeff - Coefficient for cohesion behavior.
      alignmentCoeff - Coefficient for alignment behavior.
      seperationCoeff - Coefficient for separation behavior.

    • Boid

      public Boid(Point2D.Float[] position, Point2D.Float[] velocity, float maxSpeed, float maxForce, float fieldOfView, long step, int diameter, float cohesionCoeff, float alignmentCoeff, float seperationCoeff, List<Integer> type)

    • getPositions

      public Point2D.Float[] getPositions()

    • getVelocities

      public Point2D.Float[] getVelocities()

    • getStep

      public long getStep()

    • getType

      public List<Integer> getType()

    • cohesion

      public void cohesion(int i)
      Performs cohesion behavior for a single boid, moving it towards the center of mass of its neighbors.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the boid to perform cohesion on.

    • separation

      protected void separation(int i)
      Performs separation behavior for a single boid, moving it away from its neighbors to avoid crowding.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the boid to perform separation on.

    • alignement

      protected void alignement(int i)
      Performs alignment behavior for a single boid, adjusting its velocity to match the average velocity of its neighbors.
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the boid to perform alignment on.

    • update

      protected void update(int width, int height)
      Updates the state of the boid, applying cohesion, separation, and alignment behaviors.
      Parameters:
      width - Width of the simulation area.
      height - Height of the simulation area.

    • reInit

      public void reInit()
      Reinitializes the position and velocity of each boid to its initial state. This can be used to reset the simulation.

    • limitVelocity

      protected void limitVelocity(Point2D.Float vel)
      Limits the velocity of a boid to the maximum velocity.
      Parameters:
      vel - The velocity vector of the boid to be limited.

    • limitForce

      protected void limitForce(Point2D.Float force)
      Limits the force applied to a boid to the maximum force.
      Parameters:
      force - The force vector to be limited.

    • boundedPosition

      protected void boundedPosition(Point2D.Float pos, Point2D.Float vel, int width, int height)
      Ensures that a boid remains within the bounds of the simulation area, adjusting its position and velocity if it goes beyond the boundaries.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the boid.
      vel - The velocity of the boid.
      width - Width of the simulation area.
      height - Height of the simulation area.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the Boid object. This representation includes details about each boid's position and velocity. The string starts with a header "Boid:" Each boid's details are listed in a formatted manner.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the Boid object.
